org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.raft

Interface ElectionTerm


  • public interface ElectionTerm
    ElectionTerm contains information about a RaftActors election term.

    This information includes the last known current term of the RaftActor and which peer was voted for by the RaftActor in that term

    This class ensures that election term information is persisted

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCurrentTerm()
      latest term server has seen (initialized to 0 on first boot, increases monotonically)
      java.lang.String getVotedFor()
      candidateId that received vote in current term (or null if none)
      void update(long currentTerm, java.lang.String votedFor)
      To be called mainly when we are recovering in-memory election state from persistent storage
      void updateAndPersist(long currentTerm, java.lang.String votedFor)
      To be called when we need to update the current term either because we received a message from someone with a more up-to-date term or because we just voted for someone

    • Method Detail

        latest term server has seen (initialized to 0 on first boot, increases monotonically)

          java.lang.String votedFor)
        To be called mainly when we are recovering in-memory election state from persistent storage
        Parameters:
        currentTerm -
        votedFor -

      • updateAndPersist

        void updateAndPersist(long currentTerm,
                    java.lang.String votedFor)
        To be called when we need to update the current term either because we received a message from someone with a more up-to-date term or because we just voted for someone

        This information needs to be persisted so that on recovery the replica can start itself in the right term and know if it has already voted in that term or not

        Parameters:
        currentTerm -
        votedFor -
